name: Bananas Foster Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a 6-cup muffin tin with paper liners.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 175°C. Vyložte 6-jamkovú formu na muffiny papierovými košíčkami.
instructions.ja: オーブンを350°F（175°C）に予熱します。6個のマフィン型に紙カップを敷きます。

instructions.en: In a small bowl, stir together almond flour, flax meal, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and granular Splenda (if using).
instructions.sk: V malej miske zmiešajte mandľovú múku, ľanové semienka, prášok do pečiva, škoricu, soľ a granulovanú Splendu (ak používate).
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルにアーモンドフラワー、フラックスミール、ベーキングパウダー、シナモン、塩、粒状のスプレンダ（使用する場合）を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, melt the butter in the microwave.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej miske vhodnej do mikrovlnnej rúry roztopte maslo.
instructions.ja: 電子レンジ対応の中サイズのボウルにバターを入れ、電子レンジで溶かします。

instructions.en: Stir liquid Splenda (if using), banana extract, vanilla, molasses, cream, and water into the melted butter.
instructions.sk: Do roztopeného masla vmiešajte tekutú Splendu (ak používate), banánový extrakt, vanilku, melasu, smotanu a vodu.
instructions.ja: 溶かしたバターに液体スプレンダ（使用する場合）、バナナエキス、バニラ、モラセス、クリーム、水を加えて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the dry ingredients and eggs to the butter mixture; stir with a wooden spoon until well blended.
instructions.sk: Pridajte suché prísady a vajcia do maslovej zmesi; miešajte drevenou lyžicou, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: バターの混合物に乾燥材料と卵を加え、木のスプーンでよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Fill the 6 paper-lined muffin cups evenly with the batter.
instructions.sk: Naplňte 6 papierových košíčkov na muffiny rovnomerne cestom.
instructions.ja: 6個の紙カップに生地を均等に分け入れます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15 minutes, until the tops are golden brown.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15 minút, kým vrch nezhnedne do zlatista.
instructions.ja: 15分間、または表面がきつね色になるまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Serve warm or at room temperature. Store in the refrigerator.
instructions.sk: Podávajte teplé alebo pri izbovej teplote. Skladujte v chladničke.
instructions.ja: 温かいうちに、または室温で提供します。冷蔵庫で保存してください。

notes: These Bananas Foster Muffins are a low-carb version of the classic dessert flavor. They use almond flour and flax meal instead of wheat flour, making them suitable for a ketogenic diet. The banana flavor comes from extract rather than actual bananas, keeping the carb count low. The blackstrap molasses adds depth of flavor and a hint of sweetness. These muffins can be served warm or at room temperature, but should be stored in the refrigerator for longer shelf life.
